title: How did Peru just find the oldest geoglyph, in the form of a cat, near Nazca for all the decades since Nazca lines were first discovered in 1553? Is it legit? - Quora

response.answer_text: I dare say there are thousands of old artefacts to be discovered. If you don’t look in the absolutely right place it can be difficult to spot cave paintings, Nasca lines, pyramid ruins, or painted-over church paintings. The world is a big place to hide old art. There is probably very little reason for anyone to fake a cat in Peru, so I imagine it is legit. It’s not as if someone can collect a million dollars for the discovery…

Its legit, although it doesn’t have the quality of the other nazca lines, thing is, many of these secrets exist which suddenly get discovered and which in retrospective makes one wonder “how didn’t we see them before”. it’s called “Hindsight bias”.
